original_text: Many people who lived in Lydda and Sharon saw Aeneas. They saw that he was now well and they believed in the Lord Jesus.
korean_text: 룻다와 사론에 사는 사람들이 다 그를 보고 주께로 돌아오니라

sentences.original_text: Many people who lived in Lydda and Sharon
They saw that he was now well
they believed in the Lord Jesus
